B ig Fish , maybe the best movie I watched in the first half of this year, since I am disappointed in Troy and The Day After Tomorrow . I read a movie comment about the Big Fish this afternoon, it reminds me of the world this movie described again. The movie tells the tale of a father and son, who is about to become a father himself, the mythology surrounding the father's life, and the reconciliation between fact and fiction. I ever asked a friend of mine, he is American, whether the big fish has some special meanings in the western tales, and he told me yes, the big fish always appears in the western tales, especially the fairy tales, it is a symbol for the hope, the dream, and the goodliness. I believe that everybody has a big fish in his mind, we are always looking for it, waiting for it and questing for the meaning of it. that is our lives. urlLink http://www.sonypictures.com/movies/bigfish/site/index.php urlLink http://www.mov8.com/movie/review.asp?id=16596
